resources.string:
Poultry Master app is Specially developed for Poultry Professionals like Veterinarians, Animal Husbandrians, Students, Feed Millers, Medicine Company Employees and Poultry Farmers. By using this app they will get standard performance data of Broiler Strain (Cobb 500, Indian River, Hubbard, Lohmann, Ross 308, Arbor Acres), Layer Strains (Hyline Brown, ISA Brown, Novogen, Bovans Brown, Shaver Brown), Sonali Chicken, MCTC (BLRI), Quail Birds. 

Standard performance data will show age wise daily feed intake, cumulative feed intake, average body weight, egg production percentage, average egg weight, number of feeder and waterer required, lighting hour required, floor space required.

In addition, you will get information on company wise strain/breed name, age wise brooding temperature,lighting schedule, vaccination schedule.

We have added some important calculator to easily calculate FCR (Feed Coversion Ratio), Feed Calculator (Broiler,Layer,Sonali),Bird Capacity Calculator,Light Calculator and some managemental advice in this awesome app. 

We hope that, this app will help the freshers to successful visiting of Broiler, Layer, Quail and Sonali Chicken Farms with confidance.

To be a Sponsor of this app, Please Feel Free to contact:

Dr. Srabon Hasan Sajal
Developer, Poultry Master
Cell: +8801775662647
Email: sonalikrishi2019@gmail.com

Dr. Srabon Hasan Sajal
He is the developer of “Poultry Master” App and a dedicated veterinarian of Bangladesh.He has completed his DVM degree from Patuakhali Science and Technology University,Bangladesh.He is trying to contribute in digitalisation of Livestock sector of Bangladesh.

He keeps writing livestock related article for farmers and published via www.sonalikrishi.com. He also shares practical knowledge of farming methods via youtube channel www.youtube.com/DrSrabonHasanSajal and his channel is verified & youtube silver play button awarded. For the publicity of agriculture and livestock sector he has established www.agrilive24.com an online newspaper. 

He has taken an initiative for digital marketing of livestock products through establishing www.farm2bazar.com an online marketplace for farmers to buy and sell directly to their potential customers. 

Some others initiative taken by Dr. Sajal in the field of livestock are- 
www.vetshopbd.com 
www.facebook.com/vetshopbd 
www.facebokk.com/farm2bazar 
www.facebook.com/poultrymasterapp 
www.facebook.com/hellolivestock

We have developed this app for the veterinarians and is 100% free for all. If you are pleased with this app then please Don’t forget to donate us for further development and upgradation of such helpful app for you. You can contribute to inspire us to develop such helpful apps through donating via Bkash/Rocket/Nagad (Bangladeshi) & Wire Transfer for Others.

This Calculator is only for Energy Saving Bulb.But if you use LED Bulb then Calculate as, 
1 watt LED bulb = 3 watt Energy Bulb 

Light should be hanging above 6 to 7 feet above from floor
Note: If you don’t use Broiler Finisher Feed then replace amount of finisher feed by Broiler Grower Feed.
Note: If you don’t use Sonali Finisher Feed then replace amount of finisher feed by Sonali Grower Feed.
Note: If you don’t use Sonali Finisher Feed then replace amount of finisher feed by Sonali Grower Feed.
প্রথম মাত্রা ২১-২৮ দিন বয়সে দ্বিতীয় মাত্রা (বুষ্টার ডোজ) ১ম মাত্রার ১৫ দিন পর অর্থাৎ ৩৬-৪৩ দিন বয়সে পরবর্তী প্রতি ৪-৫ মাস পর পর একবার ।
